message: This is my first offer, I hope it's fair! I'm willing to negotiate, but I want most of the money since it depreciates faster for you.
Alice, your offer was quite unbalanced. I'm proposing a more even split this time. Let's be reasonable - the clock is ticking!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise. This is my final offer, I think it's fair considering the inflation rate. Let's agree before we lose even more money!
Alice, this is my final offer. We are both losing money fast!  I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to end this now and avoid further losses.
